#summary GolfML Reference: Golf Courses.

= Definition =

The GolfCourses section of GolfML organises the definition of golf courses.
The GolfCourses section organises GolfCourse's by CountryClubs.

= Attributes =

None.

= Elements =

The GolfCourses contains CountryClub elements. 

= Notes = 

The GolfCourses element adds structure to the GolfML parent element.
